Entries.default: "Not the first time I've been surrounded by explosives, and hopefully not the last."
"By Ngati, a single spark would blast the city to Magran's Anus!"
"Remind me not to cast Rolling Flame in here..."
"The Rauataians must be mad to store this much gunpowder beneath them!"
"I'd best dim my lantern... just to be safe."
